website_summaries.verdict: A smaller rabbit hutch that makes a good indoor home base for your rabbit.
pros: Two doors on this cage make for easy rabbit access
Good for a litter trained rabbit who can come in and out of the cage on his own
Pan under the cage makes cleaning easy
cons: There are larger cages on the market that would give your rabbit more room to roam

customer_reviews.title: ONE WORD.....PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I only have GOOD things to say about this cage! I am 100% confident when I say this cage is PERFECT! From assembly to quality, this cage is 5 STAR! Furthermore, this cage is AESTHETICALLY PLEASING, I don’t even mind placing it in my living room! My bun LOVES IT TOO! I wish I would have purchased it years ago!! I’ve had three cages from a big box store and hated them! Cheap, ugly, and not healthy for my bunny! So so so glad I found this one on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

customer_reviews.title: Tray is too small
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable place for our rabbit to reside. However, the wheels were hard to put on because the pieces were cut kind of carelessly and were hard to fit together. Furthermore, the tray underneath is just a little bit too small for the space so it may catch 50% of poop but 0% urine. We have to clean the floor every time the rabbit pees. which is very frustrating. I wish I hadn't bought this, waited for it to come, just to not even work like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom tray poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: 1st I carried this package inside I heard screws lingering inside the box, I was like "oh boy this dont sound good" Then to find out more than 50% of hardware was missing. So I put my rabbit cage without the bottom wheels no problem. Then I noticed how troubling leaving it without wheels would be due to the tray opening its in the side not in the front as expected so cleaning it will be a pain in the neck! Overall its big and my rabbit seems happy in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B.

customer_reviews.title: Not just a rabbit home, but perfect bed for your cat or smaller dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I have had one for years & it is perfect for a cat or smaller dog bed that you can easily move from room to room. It can also be used so your cat can go outside but be protected by the cage. This is perfect For our 21 pound cat as it has been very hard to find a pet bed that is large enough. We put a blanket over the top and he loves it. I also use it for my chihuahuas bed/cage which they love , as well.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer WillBee

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge, roomy, sturdy cage that allows very easy access for cleaning, feeding, and petting. In addition to the side door, the top folds all the way open. It's a good cage, unless you don't want your pet standing on the wire floor. Still, I solved the problem with a woven grass mat at one end. The only thing I didn't think about was a side guard to keep urine in line with the tray so it won't spray all over the floor. I would recommend the purchase of this cage.
customer_reviews.author: dls3016

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bunny houses!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for each of my rabbits and they seem to enjoy them. I have heard bad things about the wire bottoms on their feet, but my rabbits are free-roam, and only use these houses to go into their litter box and to eat. One of my rabbits is very messy when he eats his hay, so I bought this cage and some puppy pee-pads to put along the tray. When it's time to clean the cage, I just pull out the tray and throw everything into a trash bag. This keeps him from soiling his hay or sitting in his mess.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Super cute house for my bunny baby!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little “house” for my bunny. Kinda small but he can run freely anyways. The pull out tray doesn’t really cover the entire bottom of the cage so yes it catches what it’s supposed to BUT, it Would be better if the tray was larger than the actual bottom to catch everything because everyone knows bunnies tend to be messy.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Detamore

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good cage for one rabbit, or two small breed rabbits. Sturdy, maneuverable, and easy to clean. As some other reviewers mentioned it does have a wire bottom, so make sure your rabbit has large enough paws that wont slip through, also make sure your rabbit will be able to come out enough as a wire bottom is not suitable for full time!
customer_reviews.author: Max liano

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, short tray
customer_reviews.text: Our new bunny is happy and comfortable in this cage. We added a hiding place, fleece blanket in one corner and her bunny essentials. It's cuter in person and assembles easily. The wheels do take a little time with all the washers and bolts. Snap on wheels would be quicker. It's almost 5 star worthy except our bunny sticks her bottom far out in the corner and the catch tray is too short to catch her pee. This makes for a messy floor. Since we know her potty corner, we will try adding a litter box there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Sides didn’t line up at all and the latch on the front turned outwards instead of inwards so I had to use zip ties to keep it shut. I would have returned it but the rabbit was on its way and I had no choice. It is easy to clean although the tray doesn’t line up totally so there is some spillage.
customer_reviews.author: janis carry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Indoors
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! It's durable, easy to clean, has rollers which makes it easy to move from place to place and a good price. This is more for the smaller breeds, like a mini holland lop. If you use it for a bigger bunny you could attach a play area around it so they have access to go in and out. I've had it for about a year and so far it's just like it was the day I bought it! If your going to use it outdoors I recommend it stay out of the elements. Of course who would want their bunny in the rain! I will be ordering another one for my mini rex.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The tray that goes into the bottom leaves extra room around the edges of the cage so our rabbit has peed out of the cage multiple times so far. We have also already had quite a few of the bolts fall completely off the screws just from usual use and no movement of the cage. Pretty disappointed by both of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Miller

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, BEST CAGE YET
customer_reviews.text: Omggggg I am so in love with this cage. Not only was it super easy to assemble it's super cute and super spacious for my Oatmeal, baby fuzzy lop bunny! I just brought her home and she immediately made it her home and explored it right away! And Of course this is only a night time fix I make sure she has time to run around the living room when I'm home. Would have been 5 stars but I cant seem to get a hold of the seller to send me a replacement tray because they sent me a cracked one.
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied . Bunny lives his new home :)
customer_reviews.text: I have a dwarf rabbit. He loves his new cage. The wiring on the bottom of the cage worried me a bit due to the gaps being so wide, I was afraid that his feet and nails would get caught in it so I just simply placed the bottom tray into the inside of the cage and added some bedding. There is plenty of room in here for him for the short amount of time that he's in there. I would probably recommend a larger one if your rabbit is in a cage more than he's out, but I'm really hoping that's not the case because no animal deserves to be caged up at all times. Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price, you need to use a little bit of wire twists to make it stronger.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is OK for the price. I took wire and reinforced the connections at the sides and top because honestly it seemed like it could just fall apart if I didn't -- the sides are supposed to click into each other and the top, but they did so loosely that I didn't trust it. Also, I hope no one really lets their bunny just walk around on those wires on the bottom -- please, cover it with something like cardboard or newspaper. Otherwise your bunny's feet are going to be hurt. So, I would recommend this because it is so cheap, but you have to alter it a little.
customer_reviews.author: Suzeliseg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together. Having two doors is very convenient, especially when you want to let the rabbit come and go as they please. We actually did not receive the wheels that were to go on this house and not sure if its just the rabbit but when it would go to the bathroom on the corners it would actually come out onto the floor and not the pan at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my long haired bunny and love it!! It opens from the top making it super easy to reach in and grab the bunny. It also opens from the front so they can let themselves out. My favorite part of this house is how easy it is to clean the litter. I definitely reccomend this! Also it's the perfect size. Not too big or small
customer_reviews.author: Janeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cage for Our Bunny
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this cage. Our rabbit goes in and out on his own, so the size of the cage was just right. If he had to be locked up in it all the time, it would be too small. It is sturdy and was easy to put together and set up with his things. I like the fact that it has wheels so I can move it from one to room to another if I need to. The price was good and it was worth every penny. I did have trouble trying to mount the water dish to the inside, but now he is using a different dish not one in the cage.
customer_reviews.author: katlupe

customer_reviews.title: Wheelsndont line up but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: The holes for the screws in the wheels do not align with the cage, we were able to put in 2 of the 4 screws in each wheel. Also, the slot to remove the tray is on the side, I have to move the cage to clean the tray. It would be more convenient if the tray removal was in the front. However, the cage does its job for our rabbit and well you get what you pay for. Hopefully, this cage will last us a while.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Rabbit seems happier. Grate on bottom makes a huge difference. Two ways to access inside, top and front. Wheels on bottom make cleaning much easier. I'm using way less bedding. Wish I had found this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergency use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my bunny's overnight stay at grandma's. I needed something fast, sturdy and mobile and the right size. This was perfect for my dutch rabbit. I don't recommend this product for everyday use. Rabbit's need a space to exercise and play. However, it's great for emergencies or travel purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Sophabey

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not super spacious
customer_reviews.text: This cage is actually a lot taller than I expected. I've had it for about 4 months. Our rabbit chooses to stay in it most of her time. She loves it. My only complaint would be that the roof gives more height than width. We have a feeding tray and a litter box in ours and it makes it where I have to use a hanging waterer otherwise she has no place to lay besides her litter area. It is very cute though, so it isn't an eye sore in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Over all a great rabbit house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and I like that the rabbit isn't sitting in the bedding the cage makes it for easy cleaning the poo tray just slips in and out and can be sprayed off.
customer_reviews.author: 🍑🍒🍓

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this cage as a rabbit "home"
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a bathroom/kitchen area for rabbits as a part of a larger set-up/exercise area. I would not recommend this cage as a rabbit "home". The litter pan that comes with the cage is trash. Fortunately, this cage (minus the wheels) fits perfectly inside the large cement mixing pans, which are deep enough to contain pee from spraying males and hay from messy eaters. It's great at keeping bunny's bum and feet clean, easy to assemble, and perfect for hanging hay bins and water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the mess.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. When a rabbit pees, they do so in a corner. The pee just goes right out the cage! There’s no fix for this but to put something under the cage to absorb the urine. Cute cage, but not worth the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Totally crooked
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but missing screws and bended, totally crooked
customer_reviews.author: IZzY

customer_reviews.title: I would love this kennel except for that
customer_reviews.text: Cute kennel but pee and poo end up on the floor. The tray is not quite as large as the kennel so there is a gap on both long and short sides of the kennel. I would love this kennel except for that. My bunny seems to like it. I leave the door open during the day so he can get out and hop around. He still stays in the kennel most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Donna 🌎 Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor tray design.
customer_reviews.text: The cage is well built and seems durable for small animals. But the design of the tray is poor. The tray is smaller than the floor of the cage. If your pet is near the cage walls when it goes, the tray will not catch poop and urine. Making a complete mess all over your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love this cage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage it's very pleasing to the eye and more spacious than I thought it would be!The pan is just a little bit to small but I'm going to put the cage inside a play pin in a few days for now I just put a towel underneath it for extra security from messes.
customer_reviews.author: Shereen de Kock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for a Rabbit
customer_reviews.text: This cage is just about the perfect size for the bunny I found in my yard. After you add in the water dish and food dishes, the bunny is still able to fit comfortably and stretch out. I still find that I like to let my bunny out at night and am glad that this cage has a door on the roof as well as one on the side. Makes it much easier to pick up the bunny without startling it as well as making it easier to clean the cage out of old straw.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bohman

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this for our bunny. It’s super cute and was cheaper than all the basic cages at the pet store
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: "Max" had outgrown his old cage, and this one is perfect. He loves it and has room to stretch. The wheels are convenient when we want to move him to another room. It was a great value too. My whole family loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Ok with some cons but will look for a better one
customer_reviews.text: Liked it however the plastic floor plate is shallow allowing some poop and pee to easily fall over the side but well built metal part. Wheels need stronger screws they come loose easily
customer_reviews.author: anthony brown

customer_reviews.title: Good cage 😁
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage. It is very cute and a great size for my baby holland lop bunny. The only thing I am upset about is the screws keep coming off the wheels, hopefully the wheels don’t come off !
customer_reviews.author: Lily .C

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: love and the multiple doors make it easy-to-use, liner tray and wheels also add to convenience
customer_reviews.author: Someone Who Buys Things

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Pieces don't align. So to shut the front door you have to lift it to get the lathc to aling with the whole. The top lid just pops off when you open it. Wheels are all falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: This cage was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This cage was easy to put together, I left off the wheels. It's very easy to feed my bunny and let her out to play, it's easy for her to get in and out also. I like the slide out tray on the bottom. It catches all the hay and food and litter for easy removal. It's big enough for her litter tray, food bowl and hay. Not as big as I thought, my bunny is big, but she seems ok. Thought about getting a bigger one for her to have more room, but she seems to be getting very comfortable in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gynine Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bunny Cage
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in less than 10 minutes of course this is my second cage like this that I ordered, because I got another bunny. I don't use the wheels so it's very sturdy. I may later add the wheels after I go from carpet floors to wood floors, but that will be awhile down the road. But for now this works great for me and my bunnies, they are happy and content and it's easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: For a.baby bunny only
customer_reviews.text: This cage is too small for a full grown bunny, okay for a new born bunny
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Andresen

customer_reviews.title: My bunny is happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Most important isn't if I like this cage but that my bunny likes it. His other cage became impossible to clean after some time so it needed to go. He got a nice warm bath, nice new cage and some extra goodies and he's fairly happy. I kinda have to spoil him since he is a rescue pet. His bunny momma was a bit mean to him so I took him and been spoiling him ever since.
customer_reviews.author: John Dye

customer_reviews.title: functional and pretty to boot
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 36 hrs after ordering 2-day prime. Shipping box was large and the padding protected the metal from scratching or bending. Assembling the casters was a cinch and no tools required. I have the same model that has lasted 10 years and wanted a match. There is plenty of room, functional and pretty to boot! Will purchase more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow ship/ Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to ship. When it got here it was broken!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My baby and I love this cage. I mostly have her out with me, but this is the perfect additional little room in the apartment for her, enough space for everything she wants in there. The wire floor is perfectly safe, rabbits should not be walking on their waste anyway. Just lay a blanket on the floor to give them added comfort. This cage is beautiful, sturdy, and very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!  Just put tray on top of floor wire if you don't want a wire floor.
customer_reviews.text: Really a great cage at an awesome price. After I ordered it I read the reviews mentioning that there was a wire floor that might be bad for the bunny's feet. When assembling it I just put the tray on top of the floor wire rather than in the tray drawer below - problem solved. It would be a bit easier to clean if I could just slide out the tray, but it is fine. If I want to try using the wire floor when our bunny is older I can. Great cage!
customer_reviews.author: pgpalmer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Big/Roomy and Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: These cages came pretty quickly, are very sturdy, easy to setup, and very big. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: curemode2002

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend buying a different cage!
customer_reviews.text: The size of this cage is wonderful however the slide-in piece is far too small for the cage. The cage constantly leaks and extremely frustrating. I've had to block off the walls inside to make the space smaller and still place puppy pee pads underneath the cage to prevent leakage onto the floor. I would not recommend this cage for that reason alone!
customer_reviews.author: Blair Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Taller home for the tall bunny
customer_reviews.text: The look &mobil5of the cage is perfect. My daughter likes to move him from room to room &with this cage all she has to do now is roll him. Also, very easy to assemble. Took us less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Vee-Vee

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage! My bunny loves it and easy to put a hammock since the roof is a A line
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a small pet
customer_reviews.text: Great item for a small pet. I purchased this for my rabbit, he's about 4 lbs and it's a good size for him. After about 2 yrs, three of the wheels broke off, it's stationary as well so not moved much. I did have to purchase a little pillow to place since the bottom is all wire.
customer_reviews.author: rorangel13

customer_reviews.title: cute house
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bunny house. The only thing is that a couple of the bars were bent when I took the cage out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: This cage came with tons of missing parts.. ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage came with tons of missing parts... it didn't and still doesn't have all the springs to be able to lift up part of the top... and it was missing 4 screws for the wheels... the parts were not in a bag they were just thrown in the box loose. I have had several small animals in my life and never had the issue of pee and poop going all over the floor. The trey is not large enough to reach to the edges and I spend the majority of my time bleaching the floor area under the cage. If you want to have your small animal in the house this is not the cage for you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Anson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One wheel on both cages broke. Very easy set up. Almost too small for a full grown large rabbit. Love the pan under the cage. Makes cleaning so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: I really love this enclosure! The wheels are hard to keep screwed on but I am going to hot glue or super glue them so I don't keep having to put them back on. Other than that, it's an excellent product for a very good price!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Cage assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging box arrived damaged Instructions for assembly were difficult to read and lacked clear pictures. I was able to assemble the cage. Written instructions did not match the steps in the assembly process. If you are not mechanically inclined do not order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Welch

customer_reviews.title: So cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Just as cute as pictured. Got it for a baby bunnie and keep his pee box and food in it while he has run of the room. Love it
customer_reviews.author: T Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cage for a medium size rabbit. It used to fit my rabbit but now when she got bigger she dosen't have enough room in it.
customer_reviews.author: Magui Mek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage!
customer_reviews.text: We love this cage for our new bunny! It is very spacious and sturdy! Plus it is super cute with the A frame! Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mini bunnies
customer_reviews.text: Our little lop and mini spot fits nicely in this cage, the Midwest Exercise Playpen attaches easily to make a great set up for our fur babies!
customer_reviews.author: MemphisAsFreak

customer_reviews.title: Good for small animal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my large rabbit to get him off the floor, but he became depressed to the point of not eating or drinking after being in this small cage for 3 months so I had to put him back on the floor to be able to run around and now he is happy and eating and drinking again. its a good sturdy cage and easy to clean but should be used for very small animals only.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ely

customer_reviews.title: it was good as a starter cage when my lop was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Small, didn’t use the wheels and the under carriage can be a pain to clean up. it was good as a starter cage when my lop was a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied for the price but the tray underneath the cage was broken when shipped to me. And it wasn't like the tray broke while delivering but it seemed like it was sent to me with the edges chipped off otherwise the broken pieces would still be in the box! Nothing terrible enough to return it though. OVERALL, the cage is an excellent size for my Holland lop. Enough room for him to move around and high enough for him to stand up without bumping his head. My only issues are the broken tray, and the doors (in front and on top) are pretty hard to open and close. My little Ruperts happy so, so am I :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent cage for the price. I wish it had included urine guards, though
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cage!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our Holland lop bunny. Love the modern looking design. Sooo easy to set up, no tools needed.
customer_reviews.author: D and J Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Was good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I order this thinking I would get a small bunny, I ended up getting a large one. The cage ended up being to small, my fault for ordering it without thinking. It was easy to set up, and I liked the idea of the wheels so that It could be easly moved around for cleaning. I wasnt thrilled about the slide under drip pan. I was told by the person selling me my rabbits that rabbits need to eat the fesies to help digestion. This cage was not good for that. But all and all a good cage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter cage durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a starter cage for our Bunny until she outgrew it. Very easy to put together. Comes with casters making it easy to transport Bunny outdoors to indoors. Large enough for a small Bunny or other small animal. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious outlook

customer_reviews.title: Nice but my bunny didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage but wasn’t big enough for my Holland lop bunny and he didn’t like it so ended up retuning it
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an adult rabbit. It is very small, and thinking of using only for temporary kennel while changing the other cages if weather is too bad to put her in the outdoor run. It was easy to set up and I like that there is a door on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Renee R

customer_reviews.title: Good size but need to bring more instructions to build it
customer_reviews.text: The size and price are really good but needs to have better instructions to build it.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Best Bunny House
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love this bunny house and so does my bunny!. It's very sturdy, the tray is so easy to clean, the overhead door is great and the wheels make it so easy to move around. The fact that the bunny can get out by herself prevents lifting and possibly harming her.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Crappy cage
customer_reviews.text: I can't put the house together and lock it in place because where its supposed to just slide and lock , is too loose! I cant even pinch the metal to make it secure. This cage sucks, its going in the garbage and im going to PETCO right now to get a REAL CAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: We just got this rabbit house cage and I'm already in love with it, and so is my rabbit! Its sturdy and great quality and set up was so easy. You really cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: guff0922

customer_reviews.title: The bunny home was super easy to set up straight from the box
customer_reviews.text: The bunny home was super easy to set up straight from the box. Plenty of room for our seven week old Dutch rabbit. The bunny did manage to pee over the side once but it wasn't a big deal to clean up on linoleum. The rabbit isn't showing any stress after being transferred, Eating heartily, drinking well, and laying down happily.
customer_reviews.author: AMCDeMarrias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She really likes it. Currently it’s for rodents, but it will be for a bunny. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MaryA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I’ve bought for my buns super easy to clean also easy for him to get out of on his own did buy some mats for bottom of cage so it’s not so harsh on his feet
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Zavala

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy being able to wheel our house bunny around easily
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy being able to wheel our house bunny around easily. I wish it were a big bigger. The height is good, but maybe 6 inches or so either way width or depth would be nice. Litter tray slides out easily enough. Folds down easy for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute little cage, works perfectly for my 2 pounds, 8 weeks old Holland lop. Was quite the easy to assemble and the wheels makes it easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Cage!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect beginners rabbit cage! This was my mini rex's first cage and it perfectly fit a small pet igloo, his food bowl, and a water bowl. I think this is a great beginner cage for any mini breed but I would not suggest it for any larger of a breed, I would even say its a bit small for my mini rex but perfect size for a dwarf. I ended up attaching this cage to a dog kennel to give bun a little more room to hop about and such. All and all the best cage for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small buns
customer_reviews.text: I have two lion heads, and I bought two of these cages. Plenty of room, easy to clean, easy to put together. Really like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Heather DiBenedetto

customer_reviews.title: Overall the kennel does it purpose and is a home ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the kennel does it purpose and is a home for my bunny. However, the package was defective and missing pieces. When i opened the package there were no wheels for the cart to move and when building the frame, a spring was missing on one of the corners (see photo attached). Let's just hope my bunnies doesn't push on that side of the wall to much and escapes.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great small Animal Cage
customer_reviews.text: Assembles easily and is made of good quality material. My little Lion Head bunny is happy with his new home.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Please read if you have a dog!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog got this cage open in the middle of the night and my rabbit died of a heart attack. Please please do not buy if you own another animal. I have no idea how the door got open but it did. It is so traumatizing. Please do not buy if you have other pets !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie DeMichael

customer_reviews.title: it is really good cage, easy to set up and good size ...
customer_reviews.text: it is really good cage, easy to set up and good size for 2 rabbits it got two rabbits they are not big.good size for 2 not too big not too small when you set up this you might need some cable ties and cutting tool i like this product
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for big bunnies ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Good for bigger bunnies (2+ lbs), but our little mini Rex got her foot stuck and passed away due to it. Make sure to keep bedding (such as fleece) on the bottom to prevent foot sores. Very easy to clean and fold up for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Also it was insanely easy to sit up so i could put her up ...
customer_reviews.text: My little rabbit has been a free range rabbit and it ran around the house. it was cute at first but then she bit everything and that had to stop so I got him a cage. It's huge but not to big the wheels helps to much when to move around the cage in the house. Also it was insanely easy to sit up so i could put her up fast and now she's been happy with it but i still take him out for his daily exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Gonzalez V.

customer_reviews.title: Very handi
customer_reviews.text: Love it it is just the right size. I built in a second level 4 my dwarf 🐇
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice size cage but the tray isn't big enough
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and doors on this cage, fits my lionhead mix wonderfully. My only issue with this cage is that the removable tray is quite a bit smaller than the bottom of the cage so it kind of floats around thus can lead to leaks so I have had to put another tray under the cage to catch all of that. It would be great if my rabbit was completely litter box trained but he is having issues with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Orphan squirrel says "thank you"
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our orphan baby squirrel. As he grows he needs more room to run and climb until we we can release him to the great outdoors in the spring. He said "thank you!"
customer_reviews.author: B. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Nice doggie house
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my mini Chorkie, not to bad of a dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anne Hines

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: We have a medium size rabbit and he likes the cage. We even have the litter box in one corner that he goes in all of the time. I took a bunch of carpet squares from work and cover about 3/4 of the bottom so it's soft on his feet. It also stops his hay from falling through
customer_reviews.author: T. Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Being on wire all the time becomes painful to the bunny
customer_reviews.text: I connected two so that my bunny could have more room. She loves the room. Suggestion: Add a piece of plywood on top of wire bottom for your bunny to relax on. Being on wire all the time becomes painful to the bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Corbett

customer_reviews.title: cage
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday and so far my bunny is so happy. The door on the top is convent for when little kids want to pet the bunny but i dont it out at the time. The bunny loves the front door so she doesnt have to be picked up and doesn't have to worry. I love that she can stretch out comfortably because her size, being 6 lbs. Highly recemmend this to everybody. It was super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price, 5 star for easy assembly! I did use zip ties to hold the corners of the roof firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Hibiscus

customer_reviews.title: Cage good, tray not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The cage is well built, easy to assemble. The tray is really flimsy, half the weight that it should be and it came broken. Amazon didn't do a good job packing the cage box which probably explains why the tray broke.
customer_reviews.author: Frida Kahlo

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but very cute and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cage is nice but horrible at keeping everything inside the cage.
customer_reviews.author: NikonD3100

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: I got this, and I loved it for like a day. Then I looked at some videos, and I say how small it was. I freaked out. Its a horrible cage, don't get it. My rabbit lays around all day cause she can't even run in this cage. Save your money and get a rabbit condo.
customer_reviews.author: KRW

customer_reviews.title: Good Cage, Happy Bunny
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one, just to get the new tray that slides into the cage. Would love to be able to buy just the tray, although it is still a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty cage. Easy to clean and I like the option to open the top. I wish there were a second level option since there in plenty of height space. Great size for our lionhead bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Tina1219

customer_reviews.title: cage
customer_reviews.text: At first my bunny didn't like the cage. I guess because he was not use to it. But I must say that it is very easy to clean and keep clean. He has now adjusted very well. The only fault is that it's hard to keep the wheels screwed on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: cle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased for our mini lop and was surprised at how easy to assemble and now after about two weeks of cleaning and use am very pleased with overall product. Lightweight (I did not attach the wheels but can easily lift the cage to move outside or aside when cleaning). The pull out tray is easy to keep clean and there is plenty of space for food dish, water bottle, "litter box" and hay feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kennel-Aire "A Frame Bunny House
product_meta.description: The Kennel-Aire "A" Frame Bunny House provides a safe home for rabbits to play and rest. Featuring a durable wire construction, the arched-roof rabbit cage house provides space for rabbits while keeping them secure and safe. The metal bunny cage has an easy slide-out bunny cage tray for simple cleaning and removal. Unlike other rabbit cages, the "A" Frame rabbit habitat assembles easily with no tools required. The bunny house's four heavy-duty caster wheels provide easy movement and placement for pet parents. With two separate entrances on the top and front, the large rabbit cage provides easy access for pets and pet parents.
feature_bullets: A-FRAME BUNNY HOUSE: The kennel for bunnies is made of strong metal wire & has a slide-out plastic pan for easy cleaning. Also accommodates guinea pigs, hedgehogs & other small animals. Easy to assemble.
METAL PET KENNEL: This heavy-duty kennel for small pets has heavy-duty caster wheels for easy movement & placement around your home. Rabbit enclosure also features top & front doors for easy access.
KENNELS & HOUSES: Crate & kennel training is vital for dog safety & comfort. We provide traditional travel carriers, wire training & exercise kennels, play pens, barn-style dog houses & more.

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!
